title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years. He served as Minister of Production under Eduardo Duhalde, as Interior Minister under Néstor Kirchner, as Minister of Justice under Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, and as ...

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Entre 1985 y 1987 fue secretario administrativo del Movimiento Peronista de dicha Cámara y luego accedió a la secretaría administrativa de esta institución. Durante el gobierno del Presidente Duhalde, Fernández fue designado secretario ...

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: By 1999, he became the president of his political party in Quilmes. In December 1999, he was appointed Secretary of Labour for the province. In 2001, he became the first Minister of Labour for Buenos Aires Province.

title: Buenos Aires Times | Aníbal Fernández: ‘I understand and share the president’s view on re-election’

title: Vice Minister Aníbal Fernández de Soto - Ministerio del Interior
snippet: The new Vice Minister was the former Director General of Territorial Planning and Coordinator of the National Environmental System at the Ministry of the Environment and Sustainable Development. Extensive experience as advisor on legislative and political affairs at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (2003-2006), the High Presidential Advisory Office for Reintegration (2008) and the Congress of the Republic (2002-2003.
